item.description:
Join us for our first newly redesigned Raw Maine Potluck! This potluck will be a get-to-know-you opportunity for our Raw Maine members, so come relaxed and in comfy clothes.

Please bring a raw vegan dish to share. Additional guests are welcome! Fresh local spring water, iced herbal tea, dishes, cutlery, etc. will be provided. If you need directions, call (207.423.5184) or email (info@ritefoodandcompany.com) me.

And if you're lucky, I'll whip up some raw vegan chocolate candy for dessert!

In Joy... Lisa Marie

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: August Harvest Potluck
